metadata.name: Cosmic Angelification
metadata.description:
In a last breath of humanity, man is washed away from all his sins to access angelification.

Despite this, he will retain his nature and will have to find his place among the angels to accept himself and assume his past actions.

He will navigate among the burning stars causing a chain of supernovae. In an ethereal mass of stardust, the angel will take shape and transcend its nature to become one with the universe.
